variants.Description in input context: These variants are predicted to cause a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line transfected with wild-type TRPV4 and mutant TRPV4 plasmids.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: complete loss-of-function for the [603del] variant and dominant-negative effect for the c.278C>T variant
Readout description.Result Description: For the [603del] variant, protein expression was undetectable compared to wild-type TRPV4. For the c.278C>T variant, protein expression was reduced by 50%.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TRPV4 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type TRPV4.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type TRPV4.
